item.title: NBA Salary Estimation
item.description: How much should Player X make? As I was searching for existing analyses, I came across Lewis Pipkin’s use of machine learning. I will address some mistakes I think he made in his analysis. “As per standard ML procedure”, he performed a test-train split on the data, then applied the model to his entire dataset (train AND test) to come up with “diagnoses”. The problem is… this ISN’T a standard supervised learning procedure.
